text:
(1)
Farming on Staten Island: Bee hives, pines, and dogwood on Richmond Avenue near Old Town Road.
May 19, 1926

P. L. Sperr

(2)
A ploughed field and dogwood trees, on Willowbrook Road. Among the trees is visible the Christopher Homestead, of pre-Revolutionary days.
May 6, 1929

P. L. Sperr

(3)
An orchard on Willowbrook Road, near the Christopher Homestead, at Collfield.
May 10, 1928

P. L. Sperr
title: Farming on Staten Island
